Description.Text: Club Coral View Resort is a 4-star property offering spacious accommodation in the heart of Peyia. Highlights include a swimming pool and free Wi-Fi. Peyia is located on the steep slopes of the coastal hills inland from Coral Bay. Nearby places of interest include Coral Bay and a vibrant choice of bars, cafes and restaurants. The hotel occupies a collection of mid-rise properties. Facilities include an outdoor swimming pool and terrace. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. 1-Bedroom Apartments are spacious and decorated in a modern style. They feature a well-equipped kitchen, large sitting area and private balcony. Amenities include a flat-screen TV, DVD player, work desk and en-suite bathroom. Every studio and apartment contains all the equipment needed to cook individual meals. There are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
